name: SociBook
author: Erik Sefkow

sections.description:
You can definine what and in what order you want to show spezific bookmarking Services. You can use your own iconset.

Translations by:

Polish: Tomek Slominski

German: Erik Sefkow

Du kannst entscheiden welche und in welcher Reihenfolge Social Bookmarks Services angezeigt werden. Du kannst auch eigene Iconsets, einbinden.

Following 75++ bookmarking services currently enabled:

icio.de

No Fee Charged. No Account Required. No Strings Attached.
sections.installation:
1. Upload socibook.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
I know another service, where can i report it?

use Support
